name: Jason Kirk
text: Love pizza hut in general but, your delivery driver asking for a tip? How unprofessional is that? I never tip on my company credit card always cash tips. But to flat out ask for a card tip. Dude you drive a better car than I do. Your not entitled to one. Don't act like it.
